column2: tracking visitor characteristics on a company website

column1: Clean data: Raw data might contain duplicates
column3: or outliers. Cleaning the data means maintaining the quality of data in a spreadsheet or through a programming language so that your interpretations won’t be wrong or skewed.

column1: Model data: This entails creating and designing the structures of a database. You might choose what types of data to store and collect
column2: establish how data categories are related to each other
column3: and work through how the data actually appears.

column1: Interpret data: Interpreting data will involve finding patterns or trends in data that could answer the question at hand.
Present: Communicating the results of your findings will be a key part of your job. You do this by putting together visualizations like charts and graphs
column3: and presenting information to interested parties.

column1: Programa Respeito dá o Tom
O programa nasceu com a meta de espelhar a demografia da população brasileira no quadro de funcionários da empresa.
A partir de 2020 passou por uma revisão e seu objetivo foi reconfigurado: espelhar a população negra em todos os níveis hierárquicos.
Em 2022 a Aegea emitiu um título sustentável atrelado a metas que incluem alcançar 45% de mulheres e 27% de negros em cargos de liderança até 2030

Job Purpose and Impact
O Customer Service Associate III executará uma escala limitada de atividades de atendimento ao cliente para nossa equipe de um único local. Nesta função
column2: você fornecerá tarefas clerical ou administrativas para ajudar a otimizar o processamento de pedidos complexos dos clientes e resolver problemas de pedidos ou entregas.

column1: Em cidades próximas Toledo
Key Accountabilities
Realizar tarefas administrativas ou clerical complexas em apoio a projetos e compromissos de melhoria que exijam uma compreensão básica das práticas e procedimentos de atendimento ao cliente.
Participe da execução de estratégias de atendimento ao cliente.
Informe os clientes sobre o status do pedido

Analista Contábil Jr;{'name': 'TMF Group'
SOBRE A TMF GROUP

A TMF Group ajuda seus clientes a operar internacionalmente e 'pertencer' a qualquer lugar do mundo. Nosso trabalho inclui apoiar empresas de todos os tamanhos com serviços como RH e Folha de Pagamento
column4: Governança Global e Administração e Serviços Fiduciários para Finanças Estruturadas
column5: Private Equity e Investimentos Imobiliários. Em 2022 a TMF Group adquiriu a Paraty Capital
column6: uma plataforma brasileira de administração de fundos com foco em fundos de Private Equity

column1: SOBRE O SEU PERFIL
Escolaridade: Ensino Superior em andamento;
Informática: Pacote Office +ERP (desejável);
Idioma: Inglês intermediário (desejável);
Conhecimentos sólidos em lançamento de Notas Fiscais de entrada
column3: Cadastro/Movimento de Bens do Ativo Imobilizado
column5: Ciap (Controle de Crédito de ICMS s/Ativo Imobilizado)
column6: domínio de atividades que contemplem as atividades de Contas a Pagar e a Receber
column7: conhecimentos básicos em apurações de impostos incidentes sobre o faturamento tais como: Pis

column1: SOBRE A POSIÇÃO
Efetuar correções operacionais em problemas detectados no input dos documentos fiscais no ERP;
Contabilizar folha de pagamento;

Overview
Collection Analyst
As Collection Analyst
column2: you will proactively work and support the invoice to cash process meaning that this position acts as the point of contact for all matters which relate to customer debt and billing.

column1: The role facilitates the accounts receivable activity to generate cash flow through cash collection in line with Credit Management best practice. Working closely with customers at a regional level the role ensures customer debt for the region is kept at or below corporate target levels. It also contributes to the overall satisfaction of the customers with the billing deliverables.
The world is changing. Are you ready to define with future of travel with us?
What You Will Do

To execute all debt collection activity for an assigned portfolio of customers in a dedicated region. To act as the single point of contact to the customer for the resolution of any issues or complaints around invoice validation or content and for the understanding of the invoices billing

To pro-actively contact customers regarding due payments and be responsible for prompt & accurate allocation of all customer payments received against outstanding invoices. To reconcile & agree disputes over SITA and customer invoice data. To carry out any required reconciliations of historical debts.

To work collaboratively with other SITA teams to resolve issues affecting cash collection / revenue recognition or raise issues which may impact on customer satisfaction. In particular to ensure that any problems which impact billing (e.g. contract
column4: or tax issues) are addressed promptly with the necessary parties to support resolution.

column1: To build relationships with customers to enable agreement of customer re-payment plans. To monitor and track progress on action plans. To manage process to suspend customer services in event of continued non-payment
column2: in line with SITA's agreed disconnection procedure and in accordance with SITA Credit Control Escalation Policy.

column1: To address customer satisfaction issues in the billing and payment areas. To undertake
column3: any training with customers on SITA's invoices
column5: and any other billing content and tools. Responsible to develop action plans after customers' surveys (e.g. CFF feedback on billing) or complaints (including escalations to Corporate level
column6: e.g. Orange or Red Alerts). To record and anticipate the business requirements of the customers and work on proposing solutions.

column1: To update any administrative data relating to customers (mailing address
column3: etc) in the Customer referential (e.g. CMS). Additionally
column4: to update the status of the customer's account to reflect the current escalation process.

column1: To keep data up-to-date for the production of any debt
column2: billing or customer satisfaction reports. To participate
column4: to any regional cash or billing calls or meetings.

column1: To act as a billing and payment process know-how point of contact for the Regions and Business Units. To this effect

column3: billing and payment processes up to date

column1: Do you want to help change the world? Learn more about the role:
About The Role

To support our growth in Brazil we’re looking for a Senior Logistics Analyst to join our team. Your role will be to support the Brazilian Team to execute world-class logistics planning and management.
The Logistics Analyst is responsible for daily execution of the order to cash process. This position requires heavy computer work
column2: handling multiple tasks in high pressure environment
column3: and being able to easily move between day to day tactical tasks and management issues.

column1: Responsibilities
Participate in customer contract reviews and ensure we adhere to contractual obligations where appropriate.
Manage global distributions centers (DC’s) to ensure orders are being processed in a timely manner and customer shipping windows are met.
Work closely with Distribution Centers (DC’s) to resolve demand and shipment capability conflicts.
Track and monitor end to end Fulfillment process and execute critical activities related to transacting customer shipments.
Heavy use of Oracle functionality Available to Promise (ATP) process to ensure proper alignment of supply/demand in meeting customer promised scheduled ship dates.
Manage accounts’ routing guide and stay up to date on new requirements regarding product related issues and shipping rules. This will require consistent follow up.
Work closely with finance to resolve any invoice related issues and ensure the month/qtr end processes are being followed.
Manage and execute monthly Cycle Counts and year-end Physical inventory.
Provide direct input into Supply Planner to ensure proper levels of supply are being met.
Work closely with Sales Operations in managing changes to open backlog
column4: and ensure bookings stay within DC capacity limits.

· Atuar como SOC analyst em projeto internacional no ramo bancário.
· Domínio da língua inglesa (fluente) e espanhola (avançado)
· Ter experiência atuando como SOC Analyst por pelo menos 5 a 8 anos
· Informar pretensão Salarial
· Atuação remota (a ser confirmada)
· Turno de trabalho (a ser confirmado)
Descrição detalhada do trabalho:
· O candidato deve ter trabalhado em uma equipe de SOC / CERT / resposta a incidentes por pelo menos 4 anos. As certificações da indústria são bem-vindas
· O candidato irá trabalhar junto a equipe de resposta a incidentes de cyber segurança
· Responder a alertas escalados
column6: ações de remediação e recuperação e relatórios.

column1: · Concentra-se na mitigação
column2: recuperação e correção após a ocorrência de um ataque.

column1: · Certifique-se de que os relatórios sejam inseridos corretamente no sistema de rastreamento de incidentes e coordene com a entidade relatora para obter uma compreensão completa do evento e dos detalhes
· Espera-se que tenha conhecimento de incidentes de segurança cibernética
column5: vetores de ameaças comuns e seja capaz de compreender relatórios e determinar quais atividades adicionais de ação e resposta podem ser necessárias para resolver um incidente

column1: · Siga os SOPs

column1: · Apoiar/desenvolver relatórios durante e após os incidentes
column2: que incluem todas as ações tomadas para mitigar
column3: recuperar e retornar as operações ao normal

column1: · Realizar análise de resposta a incidentes com base nos requisitos de investigação
· Participar da correção de incidentes e respostas geradas por ameaças ao vivo contra a empresa
· Registre e relate todos os incidentes de acordo com a política federal e do departamento
· Rastrear incidentes de rede e investigações até o encerramento.
· Monitorar e investigar eventos de segurança recebidos por meio do SIEM ou outras ferramentas de segurança
· Realizar triagem de Incidentes recebidos (avaliação IR inicial da prioridade do evento
column2: determinação inicial da natureza do incidente para determinar riscos e danos
column3: ou roteamento apropriado de segurança ou solicitação de dados de privacidade)

column1: · Demonstrar proficiência no Processo de Resposta a Incidentes e operações SOC
column2: e bom entendimento em busca de ameaças

column1: · Bom entendimento das informações de log do sistema e onde coletar dados/atributos específicos conforme necessário para o Evento de Incidente

column7: operações de hastes Windows e Unix/Linux

column2: Curitiba. Currently we have a team with more than a thousand associates

column2: and it was this belief that has led us to win several awards

column4: we only take into account the candidate's talent and willingness to be part of the digital transformation of our clients

column1: Lead Mobile (Android) Developer
We are looking for a Lead Mobile (Android) Developer who has a passion for creating innovative and user-friendly mobile applications. You will be responsible for leading a team of Android developers
column3: and developing high-quality applications using the latest technologies and best practices. You will also communicate and demonstrate the technical roadmaps and architecture to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

column1: Responsibilities
Lead and mentor a team of Android developers
Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform using Kotlin
Experience Leadership role working as Mobile Lead / Mobile Architect
Good working experience and understanding of Room / Live data
Good working knowledge and experience with coroutines / MVVM Architecture and Dependency injection - Dagger 2
Good understanding of Clean Architecture
Excellent communication skills
Proven skills of effective communication / demonstration of technical roadmaps / architecture to technical and non-technical stakeholders
Experience in working in Agile environment & direct interaction with business stakeholders
Nice to have:
Working experience in Push Notifications
Experience working in Hybrid apps (ionic/Angular/React)
Some understanding of tools / frameworks and working experience in iOS
What are we offering?
Support in the development of your career
